comments.text:
Right, that was the 7-minute-long pilot. A pilot is a "test episode" to see 
if a network wants to pick up an idea for a show and turn it into a 
full-fledged series. BW was never an actual series on Nickelodeon.
comments.author: Avery Beckett

comments.text:
+Sampson Williford No, it was not. The "Bravest Warriors" pilot was made in 
2009, and then, three years later in 2012, it was launched as a webseries. 
This has never been broadcast on American television. Just Youtube.
comments.author: Avery Beckett

comments.text:
+mojothemigo
You're absolutely right!
comments.author: Heropsychodream

comments.text:
+NeglectedJawBreakerVlogs Well said. Aside of from the level of crassness 
and stupidity, Adult Swim is negative and cynical. Bravest Warriors is 
positive and whimsical.
comments.author: mojothemigo

comments.text:
+mary miller The short answer is that the TV format is evolving away from 
broadcasting (i.e. on traditional TV networks), and moving towards the 
internet. Netflix and Amazon have already begun commissioning the 
production of shows that can ONLY be streamed online, and the major TV 
networks are trying to figure out how to boost ratings by also expanding to 
the internet (Hulu, HBOGo, Sho, etc.)

"Bravest Warriors" is already a good product with a sizable fan following 
and effective viral marketing, so why would it make sense to take the show 
anywhere else? Not only does it seem like Frederator WANTS to help Internet 
TV become a Legitimate Thing, it's going to blow up in the next decade or 
so whether they're on board or not, so... might as well be on board.
comments.author: Avery Beckett

comments.text:
in the very first episode of the series Chris was right Danny does have 
some serious moop he's going through, I mean he is trying to decide between 
Chris and plum (I think) and his chances with either of them are slim, but 
anyway that's my opinion. art has a different affect  on everyone. I think 
it was really cool for CH (cartoon hangover) to put the idea that Danny is 
bisexual, but like I said you (the reader) may have a different take and 
that's ok. dang I should film a review of this episode its my favorite. I'm 
just stating my opinion and I feel that this episode is kinda creepy but it 
shows that (no I'm not going to say that Jesus is the answer to everything, 
and no Im not going to say that being homo is wrong) Danny is trying to 
find a solid sexuality because in this world and the future people are 
so one brained someone has to be one way or the other so to speak, plus he 
doesn't want to be a cheater cause that's just cruel. at the scene where 
roboChris is dancing in Danny's room Danny noticed how he had made a robot 
that showed how dispirit he was and also how the reall Chris liked Beth so 
he just gave up and went for plum.
                                                                              
no hate please,
                                                                                               
puppyinabox.

captions.text: What's my favorite color?
Abe Lincoln!
Nooo... what's my favorite food!
The Miracle of Childbirth!
Close... when is my birthday?
Yesterday! Hey! By the way, happy belated 17th buddy!
Thank you for remembering Robo-Chris!
I'm invented! Sup, bros?
Ha ha! That's totally not cool.

Doesn't he get to have skin? We've got a bunch
extra in Cargo Bay Two.
Hey guys, sorry I'm late.

Aaaah! My god, that guy looks exactly like
me!
What's... going on here?
He's you Chris, 'cept better!

He's laser resistant, flameproof, and I juiced
up his dancing skills nine thousand percent!
Ladies love this... ladies love this...
Danny... that... is... awesome!
What?
You're not insulted?
You're damn right, I'm insulted!

I think maybe he's evil, Danny. Why would
you birth evil?

You guys, this is great! Robo-Chris can sub
for me on missions! We can program him to

have that Italian accent I always wanted,
and now I can dole out twice as many deep,
meaningful hugs.

Robo-Chris gives me all the hugs I'll ever
need. I hope that doesn't make you insanely

jelly, Chris. Don't lose your temper and smash
him into tiny oil-spurting chunks!
Of course not! I'd never do that!
I'll do it!

Everybody is overreacting. I think Danny's
invention is brilliant.
I will do a murder on you.
I... still need to adjust his moop drive.

You're... finishing our crossword puzzle with
Robo-Chris?

Oh, I hope you don't mind man. He's just so
good at it. I barely noticed
it wasn't really you.

He's so handy! You guys should start that
friendship garden we always dreamed about
when we were kids.
He's not jelly at all!
I will hit him with rocks until he is jealous!
Are you pretending to be evil again?
I like to make you smile.
Set fluorescent bio-slime gauges at zéro!
Set!

Danny, we've got a red honk on gauge two,
can you - Danny?
Strut like you mean it! Yeah, stir that sauce!

Oh, I'm sorry Chris. I'm just so busy over
here with my new best friend!

Oh that's cool, man. I'll take care of this
for you.
Back to work! No more distraction.
Mmm... oh my heavens.

Danny, you have so much tension stored in
your shoulders!
Your robo-fingers are like magic! Auuughh.

Heh... hey Robo. I built a little work-station
just for you, man!
Whoa.
Um...
I was just about to text you that exact message!
Psh! Ha ha ha!

Well I guess we're just gonna have overclock
your friendship synthesizers into
maximum hyperdrive!
There! Feel any different?
Not different! Better!
Ha ha! Friendship!
Hug. Hug. Hug. Hug.
Oh man, dude!
I love you, Danny.

If sounds so weird to finally say that out
loud! My name is Chris Kirkman and I love
Danny Vasquez!

This little weirdo is starting to grow on
me.
What's this all about, man?

These are the moments that define a friendship,
Chris. This is what real friends look like!

It is? This what you want? A needy little
guy who climbs all over you?
There's nothin' wrong with that!

Friends have boundaries, Danny. When someone's
your friend, there's a line that should never
be crossed.
Well... I mean... never say never...

No, dude. Robo-Chris is just... extremely
comfortable in his heterosexuality...

Yeah, Chris. How come you don't help Danny
chew his food?
Wwm Nuhm Nwolmn!
He's just jelly.

Chris, I'm sorry if my ultimate friend makes
you strawberry jelly.

Stop saying jelly! Nobody needs to say jelly
ever again! I can't even begin to understand
why you do this.

Hurts doesn't it? I guess you don't know what
you've got 'til it's gone, huh?
What? What is your problem?
YOU FORGOT MY BIRTHDAY!

I... oh. Dude, I'm sorry. Happy Birthday,
man...
Thanks, dude! Up top, cough drop!
Do you like what you see?

Oh, of course. You're my invention and I'll
always be proud of you, but-

C'mon now. You know I don't like to dance
alone.

Robo-Chris, I think we're at a point where
what you want and what I can offer you
no longer match.
What are you saying, Danny?
I don't think you should sleep here any more...
Yeah, all right!
Woo hoo!
Aw yeah, scootin' over!
Dancin'! Uh huh!
HWAAAAUGH!

title: Danny Invents Evil in "RoboChris" - (Bravest Warriors Season 2 Ep. 2)
